About Us

Who Are We?

Here at Coding Mind, we aim to promote Computer Science education for K-12 students and grow students interests and passion about Computer Science. We teach programming and computational thinking with a hands-on approach by always doing and building things.

Our Mission

We believe that students should learn coding in a fun way.

Our Values

Learn with Fun. Always Build. Passion For Coding.

Our Story

Why We Founded Coding Mind

Established by a group of experienced American teachers, Coding Mind emphasizes the importance of developing critical thinking and problem-solving skills in students, which can be applied to various aspects of their future lives and lead to a brighter future.

The idea begins with the concept of spreading computer science fundamentals among children. They are exposed to different languages at an early age, and coding is a language through which they can develop logical and creative skills. This can lead to the development of apps and games in the future. It's a creativity that results in the creation of something unique!

Geared towards K-12 students, the classes at Coding Mind incorporate elements of programming languages, artificial intelligence, game development, and other relevant fields. Over the past few years, Coding Mind has not only provided valuable educational and entrepreneurial guidance for students, but has also successfully paved the way for their admission to top universities. Join us at Coding Mind and unlock a world of endless possibilities for your child's future!

"Coding is important,
like any other sport these days."

Why Coding Mind Works

Coding helps children visualize abstract concepts, apply math to real-world situations, and make math fun and creative. As they learn to code and give directions, they also learn that there is no one way to do something, and that even if their initial approach didn't work, they can improve upon it without worrying about failure. Coding is a basic literacy in the digital age, and it is crucial for kids to understand and be able to work with the technology around them.

Try the full Coding Mind experience for free!

Take a free class to see if Coding Mind is right for your child.
